name: Uloz.to! Fix

user.name: R3gi CZ
user.about:
I'm hobby amateur designer from Czech Republic. Here I would like to share UI styles for services I use a lot. I think it's better to share them than just keep them for my personal use. That's all. I hope you'll find them useful.

If you like my work, you can write me some feedback or you can by me a beer ;-)

additional_info:
This style removes some ads and changes certain elements width to make them use full page width.

If you find it useful, don't be afraid to leave a comment or you can buy me a beer ;-)
